mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.wxopenid AS "wxopenid", (select case when name is not null AND LENGTH(NAME)>0 then name else nickname end from member where wxopenid = a.wxopenid) AS "name", (select mobile from member where wxopenid = a.wxopenid) AS "mobile", a.jine AS "jine", a.layer AS "layer", a.orderid AS "orderid", a.xfzwxopenid AS "xfzwxopenid", a.xfzname AS "xfzname", a.xfjine AS "xfjine", a.ffzt AS "ffzt", a.ordertype AS "ordertype", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", (select headimgurl from member where wxopenid = a.wxopenid) AS "headimgurl", (select nickname from member where wxopenid = a.wxopenid) AS "nickname"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fenxiao_yongjin( id, wxopenid, name, mobile, jine, layer, orderid, xfzwxopenid, xfzname, xfjine, ffzt, ordertype, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{wxopenid}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{jine}, #{layer}, #{orderid}, #{xfzwxopenid}, #{xfzname}, #{xfjine}, #{ffzt}, #{ordertype}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fenxiao_yongjin SET wxopenid = #{wxopenid}, name = #{name}, mobile = #{mobile}, jine = #{jine}, layer = #{layer}, orderid = #{orderid}, xfzwxopenid = #{xfzwxopenid}, xfzname = #{xfzname}, xfjine = #{xfjine}, ffzt = #{ffzt}, ordertype = #{ordertype}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
